translations: n.[园艺]枇杷（loquat 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Now I got problem picking loquats.
Fruits ranging from loquats, lichees, longans to tangerines are in plenty.
sentences.translation: 水果是从枇杷、荔枝、龙眼，一直吃到福桔！

sentences.sentence: The time for loquats is perhaps now over, but lychees will soon be in full season.
sentences.translation: 从元旦橘子想到除夕的年糕、枇杷，此刻大概已经过时，荔枝快要上市了。
